sentences.en: Ask the butcher for soup bones (marrow bones are best).
sentences.cn: 跟肉铺老板要煲汤用的骨头（最好是髓骨）。

sentences.en: He owns the butcher's in the main street.
sentences.cn: 他在大街上开了一家肉铺。

sentences.en: He was as great a butcher as the world has been.
sentences.cn: 他是有史以来最大的杀人狂.

sentences.en: I must go to the butcher's, too.
It was the same with the butcher and several others.
sentences.cn: 对于肉铺老板和其他几家老板,他也采用了同样的办法.

sentences.en: let's take a butcher's at those bugs.
sentences.cn: 让我们看看那些甲虫吧。

sentences.en: Liu Hulan unflinchingly faced death under the butcher's knife of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 刘胡兰在敌人的屠刀面前大义凛然,视死如归.

sentences.en: Mother went to the butcher's yesterday.
One was to go to the butcher, another to the grocery.
sentences.cn: 一次是去肉铺, 另一次是去杂货店.

sentences.en: Pigs were butchered, hams were hung to dry from the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 猪被宰杀了，火腿吊在屋顶下风干。

sentences.en: The butcher is under a cloud because the inspectors found that his scales were not honest.
sentences.cn: 这个卖肉商丧失了信誉,因为检查人员发现他的秤缺斤短两.

sentences.en: The butcher shop will bill me for the meat I bought this month.
sentences.cn: 肉店将把我这个月所买的肉钱开帐单给我.

sentences.en: The butcher weighed the meat on the scales.
The butcher will trust us for the meat.
sentences.cn: 肉店老板将把肉赊给我们.

sentences.en: The general is a real butcher.
sentences.cn: 那将军是嗜杀成性的人.

sentences.en: There was a butcher's shop alongside the theatre.
Were you at the butcher's, too?

trans.tran_cn: 屠夫，肉贩子，肉店，刽子手
trans.tran_en: A butcher is a shopkeeper who cuts up and sells meat. Some butchers also kill animals for meat and make foods such as sausages and meat pies.
to kill animals and prepare them to be used as meat
to kill animals and prepare them to be used as meat
